name: Hitstun (itch)
description:
Hitstun is an online multiplayer card game with the soul of a fighting game. We want players to feel the aesthetic and strategy of a fighting game while having the accessibility of a strategy card game. 

Match with another player and engage in battle. The first person to reduce their opponent’s health point wins. 

You can also play in Single Mode vs an AI bot. You can practice your character and their combos in this mode. 

Check out how to play and also character guides on our website: Jablockgames.com
